column4: and I hoped in my Dad's Jeep one evening and came here for dinner. It was around 6:30pm on a weeknight
column5: and line was out the door. We nearly left and went somewhere else
column6: but my Dad's girlfriend insisted that the food would be worth the wait. Finally we got inside and noticed that a guy was taking orders so that the line would move a little smoother and quicker. He was also nice enough to see to it that we would get a table(all of them were full) and get me a paper menu because my eyes were not allowing me to read the chalkboard menu.
